unnormalised: Bore, tum mhaka sangtat ki tumka *azun* algebra-n problem zata? Chinta kor naka, yaar, tum ekleuch nhoi! Ganit masta trasdaik zata, khas korun jevhna aksharam ankank mellovn ghetat. Tem mhantlear konnem tori ekdom borem aslolea vishayak jaanvun-sun goll kortuk sodta. Punn mazyacher visvas dovra, eke pavtim click zalea uprant, tem khorench thodem bhov maja kortat. Sumar-sumar.
normalised: Bore, mhaka tumi mhaka sangta ki tumi *azun* algebra sangat zuzztat mhunn? Chinta koru naka, yaar, tumi eklle nacha! Ganit khoree dukhi asonk zata, khas korun jevha aksharam ani ankam ek mekaat mix zata. Tem asa, konnek khoob borevishil vishay jaanvun chukoon bhonvravanchem kelam. Pun mhaka visvas div, ek pavtim tem click zallem mhunllear, tem asalkich majjechem. Sumaar.

unnormalised: Az ami soglleanche avddentlea vishoyacher utar korchea (hanstak aikavat): algebra ani sameekaran. Nirdisht panantlean, ami thodde sadharonn chukka ani teo koxeo tallchea te poloytolim. Tem "algebra-nt borem zanvcheak" crash course mhunn chintun ghe.
normalised: Aaz, ami soglleanchem favorte (vyangachee thoddi tone haanga ghalat): algebra ani somikaranak hath lavpak assa. Khas korun ami kaim samanya chuka ani tem koxem talche te dekhum. Tem aslem mhunn chintat "algebraant bore zanvche" krash kors.

unnormalised: Poilech, BODMAS ugddas asa? Vo PEMDAS, vo zonn thodde acronym tumche school vapurta. Tem masta mahatvachem! Koushtak *poilem* korunk visravchean tumche utor purai bigddunk xakta. Gambhirtan. Mhantlear, tumche kodden 2 x (3 + 5) asa, mhantlear (3 + 5) = 8 poilem korat, magir 2-n gunnkarat. Nimanne utor 16 asa. 2 x 3 + 5 = 11 nhoi. Tufavat pollaitat? Tem masta vhodd!
normalised: Pehle, B-O-D-M-A-S ugddaas dovrat? Ya P-E-M-D-A-S, ya tumche shallem je acronim vaparta. Tem khub mhatvachem! bracketak *poile* karank visrunk tumche javabak sampurn bhonvravank zata. Khoree sangta. Te sokath, tumka don gunille open bracket teen plus panch close bracket asat, open bracket teen plus panch close bracket baraabareen aath poile kartat, magir donan gunnkartat. Antim javab solla asa. Don gunille teen plus panch baraabareen egra mhunn nacha. Farak dissa? Tem khub voddlem!!

unnormalised: Pudden: nakaratmak nishann. Te lukochich lagtat! Nishchit korun taka boro vanttun ghetat. Eke sadharonn chuk mhantlear -(x + 3). Zaite lok -x + 3 borovtat, je *purai* chuk asa. Tem -x - 3 asunk zai. Ugddas dovrat, nakaratmak nishann koushtache bhitor *soglleak* lagu zata.
normalised: Pudchem: negative chinnam. Te choriye lille dev asa! Khaatree kor negativeak barobar vanttat. Aika classic chuk mhunnllear negative open bracket x plus teen close bracket. Zaite zann negative x plus teen liktat, jem *poornpaneen* chukichem asa. Tem negative x minus teen zoonk zai. Ugddaas dovrat, negative chinnam bracketache *soglle* bhitar lagta.

unnormalised: x sodo? Borem! Punn ugddas dovrat ekuch vostu sameekaranachea *donuy* vatten karunk. Tum eka vatten 5 zoddle, mhantlear tumka *zoddpak zai* dusrea vatten 5. Natar, sogllem fattonk xakta. Tem tum dolyeak don veg-vegllea vajan sambhallpak sodtat - tem kaam korchonach. Ani, tumka x = kitem tori pagal zata jevhna 12345/6789, tor daronaka. Tem sarkhem asunk xakta! Sadaiv tumche kaam double-check korat.
normalised: x hak sodtat? Bhov borem! Pun ugddaas dovrat somikaranche *donuyo* bazuak ekach vostu karank. Tum ek bazuak panch meltat zalear, tumka dusre bazuak panch melpache *lagta*. Na zalear, sagllem bhuglleek padtta. Tem don vegvegle vaznam gheun ek see-sawak santulan korpaachem asa - tem zaana. Atam, tumka x baraabareen bara hazar teenxim challis panch bhagille sa hazar saatxim ekyanevem asat, bhionk naka. Tem sarkhem asonk xakta! Pun tumche kamak don pavtim parakh korat.

unnormalised: Ani, nimanni tip: srav korat! Mhaka khobor asa, mhaka khobor asa, tum te aikunk thaktat. Punn gambhirtan, jevhna odhik problem tum sodyache, tum tankan borem zatolim. Sopeam kodden suru korat, magir thoddenthoddken kathinn vostunche vatten vollyat. Khan Academy sarkhele site tumche ixtt asat. Ugddas dovrat tem last year's IIT-JEE exam-ache srav-paper tum poloyle? Tem upyogache zaunk xakta.
normalised: Ani, antim tip: practice korat! Mhaka mahit asa, mhaka mahit asa, tumi tem aikunk thakun gelyaat. Pun kharee sangta, tumi jevde samasse sodtat, teude tumi bore zatale. Sope sangatan suru korat, magir dhere dhere kathin vostuk vochat. Khan academy sarkhe sites tumche ixtt asa. Atam, ugddaas dovrat practice pepar je aile varshachem I-I-T-J-E-E tumi dekhle? Tem kaamiek yetale.

unnormalised: Mhantlear thoddyo tip amchi kodden asa. Aashaa karta, algebra thodem bhov bhirantichi durlabh kortat. Atta tya sameekaran jinkhok vho, mhoje ixtt! Ani dar pavtim eke chai break ghevpak visronaka. Tumka tem favo zata! Tumche marks sumarak 10% lean dhokhe zhalyar, mhaka message kor! :)
normalised: Te sokath tumka te asa. Thodde tip je sumartapon algebraak thode bhionvchem korunk xakto. Atam vochat ani tench somikaranak jikat, mhoje ixtta! Ani chai break ghevak kenna tori visru naka. Tumi te layak asa! Tumche marks dha percentan vadhle nacha zalear, mhaka message korat! smile-face
